Name: Call of Duty: World at War

Achievements.Name: Carlson's Raiders
Achievements.Description: Complete 'Semper Fi' on any difficulty. (Solo only)

Achievements.Name: Stormed Peleliu
Achievements.Description: Establish a beachhead on the island of Peleliu on any difficulty. (Solo only)

Achievements.Name: The Last Stand
Achievements.Description: Survive the land and air conflict surrounding Okinawa on any difficulty. (Solo only)

Achievements.Name: Stabbed in the Heart
Achievements.Description: Complete all missions on the Eastern Front on any difficulty setting. (Solo only)

Achievements.Name: Get Your Hands Dirty
Achievements.Description: Complete 'Semper Fi' on Veteran difficulty. (Solo only)

Achievements.Name: Saved Private Ryan
Achievements.Description: Save the soldier before he burns to death. (Solo or co-op)

Achievements.Name: Bloody Peleliu
Achievements.Description: Complete 'Little Resistance' on Veteran difficulty. (Solo only)

Achievements.Name: Weapon of Mass Destruction
Achievements.Description: Radio in a naval bombardment that kills at least 4 Japanese soldiers. (Solo or co-op)

Achievements.Name: The Sword Is Broken
Achievements.Description: Complete 'Hard Landing' on Veteran difficulty. (Solo only)

Achievements.Name: No Safe Place
Achievements.Description: Burn an enemy out of a tree with the flamethrower in 'Hard Landing' (Solo or co-op)

Achievements.Name: Architect
Achievements.Description: Complete 'Vendetta' on Veteran difficulty. (Solo only)

Achievements.Name: The Professional
Achievements.Description: Shoot all of Amsel's henchmen, including their attack dog, without reloading. (Solo only)

Achievements.Name: Gunslinger
Achievements.Description: Assassinate General Amsel with a pistol shot. (Solo only)

Achievements.Name: The Hammer Strikes
Achievements.Description: Complete 'Their Land, Their Blood' on Veteran difficulty. (Solo only)

Achievements.Name: Scorched Earth
Achievements.Description: Complete 'Burn`em Out' on Veteran difficulty. (Solo only)

Achievements.Name: Firestarter
Achievements.Description: Complete a mission using only the flamethrower. Melee, grenades & explosives are OK. (Solo or co-op)

Achievements.Name: Fearless
Achievements.Description: Complete 'Relentless' on Veteran difficulty. (Solo only)

Achievements.Name: Hell on Wheels
Achievements.Description: Complete 'Blood and Iron' on Veteran difficulty. (Solo only)

Achievements.Name: Iron Fist
Achievements.Description: Destroy all towers and bunkers in 'Blood and Iron'. (Solo or co-op)

Achievements.Name: No Return
Achievements.Description: Complete 'Ring of Steel' on Veteran difficulty. (Solo only)

Achievements.Name: Ruthless
Achievements.Description: Kill 15 enemies while mounted on a tank in 'Ring of Steel'. (Solo or co-op)

Achievements.Name: When It Rains, It Pours
Achievements.Description: Complete 'Eviction' on Veteran difficulty. (Solo only)

Achievements.Name: Shot in the Dark
Achievements.Description: Kill 10 enemies while the lights are out in the subway in 'Eviction'. (Solo or co-op)

Achievements.Name: One Bad Gato
Achievements.Description: Complete 'Black Cats' on Veteran difficulty. (Solo only)

Achievements.Name: The Sum of All Zeros
Achievements.Description: Down 45 Japanese Zeros in 'Black Cats'. (Solo only)

Achievements.Name: Lights Out!
Achievements.Description: In 'Black Cats', blast out all of the spot lights in the Japanese cargo convoy. (Solo only)

Achievements.Name: Blowtorch & Corkscrew
Achievements.Description: Complete 'Blowtorch & Corkscrew' on Veteran difficulty. (Solo only)

Achievements.Name: Setting of the Sun
Achievements.Description: Complete 'Breaking Point' on Veteran difficulty. (Solo only)

Achievements.Name: Mortar-dom
Achievements.Description: Kill 8 Japanese with thrown mortars in 'Breaking Point'. (Solo or co-op)

Achievements.Name: Guardian Angel
Achievements.Description: In the final battle for Okinawa, save Sergeant Roebuck. (Solo or co-op)

Achievements.Name: For the Motherland
Achievements.Description: Complete 'Heart of  the Reich' on Veteran difficulty. (Solo only)

Achievements.Name: Bearing the Burden
Achievements.Description: Complete 'Downfall' on Veteran difficulty. (Solo only)

Achievements.Name: Rough Economy
Achievements.Description: Kill 3 enemies with a single bullet. (Solo or co-op)

Achievements.Name: Close Shave
Achievements.Description: Survive a Banzai attack. (Solo only)

Achievements.Name: Snake in the Grass
Achievements.Description: Take out a Japanese soldier while he is lying in wait in the grass. (Solo or co-op)

Achievements.Name: Grave Robber
Achievements.Description: Collect all Death Cards in the game. (Solo only)

Achievements.Name: Kamikaze
Achievements.Description: Complete any level on Regular difficulty or higher using only melee and grenades. (Solo only)

Achievements.Name: Throw a Six and a Half
Achievements.Description: On Hardened or Veteran difficulty, complete a level without dying. (Solo only)

Achievements.Name: Purple Heart
Achievements.Description: When staring into the face of adversity, show courage and persevere.

Achievements.Name: War Hero
Achievements.Description: Complete the game on any difficulty. (Solo only)

Achievements.Name: Hardened War Hero
Achievements.Description: Complete the game on Hardened or Veteran difficulty. (Solo only)

Achievements.Name: Get Your Left Foot Wet
Achievements.Description: Complete a match in Campaign Co-Op mode over Xbox LIVE. (Online co-op only)

Achievements.Name: Get Your Right Foot Wet
Achievements.Description: Complete a match in Competitive Co-Op mode over Xbox LIVE. (Online co-op only)

Achievements.Name: Blue Ribbon
Achievements.Description: Complete a 4-player Competitive Co-Op match in 1st place over Xbox LIVE. (Online co-op only)

Achievements.Name: Itâ€™s All about Prestige
Achievements.Description: You achieved the first level of Prestige. Only 9 more to go.

Achievements.Name: Go Get Some Sun
Achievements.Description: You achieved the highest level in the game. Time to go outside and find some things to do...
